TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Reflection.Module ModuleResolveEventHandler(object sender, ResolveEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed ModuleResolveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ModuleResolveEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ResolveEventArgs) As Module
public delegate System::Reflection::Module ^ ModuleResolveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ResolveEventArgs ^ e);
type ModuleResolveEventHandler = delegate of obj * ResolveEventArgs -> Module

param.name: sender
param.span: 曾作为事件源的程序集。

span.span: The assembly that was the source of the event.

param.name: e
param.span: 由描述事件的对象提供的参数。

span.span: The arguments supplied by the object describing the event.

summary.span: 表示将要处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .
The module that satisfies the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果公共语言运行时类加载程序无法解析对程序集通过正常方法的内部模块的引用，将引发此事件。If the common language runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an internal module of an assembly through normal means, this event is raised. 此委托的事件处理程序必须找到并返回满足此请求的模块。The event handler for this delegate must locate and return a module that satisfies the request. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的一系列称为事件处理程序的执行。The following example demonstrates the sequence of execution in which an event handler is called. 在此示例中，Server1 是 MySample 类的一个外部模块。In this example, Server1 is an external module of the MySample class. ### 若要编译和运行示例To compile and run the example 1. 打开命令提示符窗口并导航到包含 MySample.cs 的目录。Open a Command Prompt window and navigate to the directory that contains MySample.cs. 2. 编译 Server1 使用以下命令：Compile Server1 using the following command: ```console csc /out:subfolder\Server1.netmodule /t:module Server1.cs ``` 3. 编译 MySample 使用以下命令：Compile MySample using the following command: ```console csc /out:MySample.exe /t:exe /addmodule:subfolder\Server1.netmodule MySample.cs ``` 4. 运行 MySample.exe。Run MySample.exe. > [!NOTE] > 模块文件 Server1.netmodule 必须名为"子文件夹"对于此示例才能正常工作的子目录中。The module file Server1.netmodule must be in a subdirectory named "subfolder" for this example to work properly. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.ModuleResolveEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.moduleresolveeventhandler/cs/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.ModuleResolveEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.moduleresolveeventhandler/cs/server1.cs#2)]
